formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'MP3Player' =-
[Synopsis] Play an MP3 file or stream
[Description] MP3Player(location) Executes mpg123 to play the given location, which typically would be a filename or a URL. User can exit by pressing any key on the dialpad, or by hanging up.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,6 @@ Play an MP3 file or stream
[Description] - MP3Player(location) Executes mpg123 to play the given location, + MP3Player(location): Executes mpg123 to play the given location, which typically would be a filename or a URL. User can exit by pressing any key on the dialpad, or by hanging up.
